urls.title: Epidemiologist: Coronavirus could be 'exterminated' if lockdowns lifted
urls.description: The unprecedented policy of mass quarantine to "flatten the curve" is only prolonging the coronavirus pandemic, contends epidemiologist Kurt Wittkowski

text:
@RWPUSA We have been spreading the flu and obtaining herd immunity for thousands of years.... now all of the sudden we need to shut everything down.  Listen to an expert on the subject

https://t.co/uD9M4hmzi5
